text: Samara Freemark is an American journalist. She produces the podcast In the Dark. She won a Peabody Award and George Polk Award. She studied at Swarthmore College and the University of Michigan. She has worked for Radio Diaries, and WUOM. == References == Category:Living people Category:American journalists Category:George Polk Award winners Category:Peabody Award winners
title: Samara Freemark
